Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates by calling the statement that Biden received more of the popular vote than any other President in history a "lie." This is an exaggeration because Biden did, in fact, receive a record-breaking number of votes.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support as it does not provide any evidence or data to back up the assertion that Biden's popular vote claim is false.
Exist alternative explanation: The claim does not provide any alternative explanation for Biden's record-breaking popular vote count. It simply dismisses it as a lie without offering any alternative reasons or explanations.
